item.title: MiL.k

item.description:

Mil.k Coin is a cryptocurrency that functions as the currency of the platform and is the medium that integrates Brand Tokens of the aligned service companies. On the platform, Brand Token is like […]

The post MiL.k appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
Mil.k Alliance Project is a platform that brings together the points of lifestyle services
and make them interchangeable for other services you need.

Mil.k Coin is a cryptocurrency that functions as the currency of the platform and is the medium that integrates Brand Tokens of the aligned service companies. On the platform, Brand Token is like a product, and Mil.k Coin is the currency to purchase it.

The post MiL.k appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: TRVL
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
TRVL is the driving force behind the travel industry’s web3 revolution. The TRVL utility token redesigns the travel experience, making it more inclusive, democratic and rewarding. By utilizing TRVL within web3 travel ecosystems, travelers, travel providers and other industry participants can enjoy a more rewarding and empowering experience, with significantly greater ownership of their travel […]

The post TRVL appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
TRVL is the driving force behind the travel industry’s web3 revolution. The TRVL utility token redesigns the travel experience, making it more inclusive, democratic and rewarding.

By utilizing TRVL within web3 travel ecosystems, travelers, travel providers and other industry participants can enjoy a more rewarding and empowering experience, with significantly greater ownership of their travel activities.

Book travel and receive discounted booking fees when paying in TRVL. Use TRVL to receive rewards within supported travel ecosystems. Shape the future of travel and hospitality by submitting and voting on proposals.

The post TRVL appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: Ariva
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
ARV has been produced for active use in global and local tourism and travel networks in the near future. Project is a worldwide B2C travel & tourism network where members can meet with global and local tourism service providers in the light of previous travelers’ experiences and shares, make bookings with Cryptocurrency and earn crypto […]

The post Ariva appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
ARV has been produced for active use in global and local tourism and travel networks in the near future. Project is a worldwide B2C travel & tourism network where members can meet with global and local tourism service providers in the light of previous travelers’ experiences and shares, make bookings with Cryptocurrency and earn crypto money from both their reservations and valuable content sharing.

Ariva was produced to eliminate the expensive costs of international high-volume money transfers and the Swift transaction complexity in tourism and travel transactions, which are among one of the highest volume industries in the world economy. One of its main aims is eliminate the complexity and difficulty arising from the use of local currency in the destination country.

ARV is the tourism cryptocurrency of the near future that can be spent safely in every country of the world from its crypto money wallet, eliminating the need to carry cash or debit cards.

The post Ariva appeared first on CryptoSlate.

item.title: MAPS
item.dc:creator: CryptoSlate Coins
item.description:
Maps.me 2.0 has both online and offline maps while offering DeFi functionalities to its users. Token-holders using the app will benefit from personalized promotions and rewards, likely driving adoption, retention, and virality of MAPS within the community.

The post MAPS appeared first on CryptoSlate.
item.content:encoded:
Maps.me 2.0 has both online and offline maps while offering DeFi functionalities to its users. Token-holders using the app will benefit from personalized promotions and rewards, likely driving adoption, retention, and virality of MAPS within the community.
